Thank you for registering with Looky. Looky is a virtual try-on app that makes it easy to find clothes you love. To use this service, you need to verify your email address.
magic_link.instruction: Enter the verification code below in the app to complete your email address verification. Please complete the verification within 24 hours.
magic_link.warning1: â€»If you do not recognize this email, it may have been sent to you by mistake. Please delete this email without taking any action.
magic_link.warning2: â€»The verification link is valid for 24 hours. If it expires, please send the verification request again.
